Text.Page: Don't tell anyone...but I like your alliance the best.

Are you ready to join? Will you choose the Free Traders Collective, who feel everyone should enjoy the wealth of noctenium? Or the sagacious fellowship of the Enlightened Union? Or the hard-core Iron Order?
Guildmasters seeking to join an alliance should seek me out.
The federation has troubles. Don't you think it's time for new leadership?
